song.englishname: Red Will Dye These Snows Of Silver

english.segment1: I arrived to hear the earth unleash its cries. A guilty hand. The fruit of past fracturings. First to be of many future histories. From suffered birth
english.segment2: Now red will dye these snows of silver. Red will dye these snows of silver
english.segment3: Famous by the mark inflicted on your life. The generations find new use for your crime. On green hills an angel guards a bleak reminder. For all time
